text: Therese Ann Rutherford (November 2, 1917 â€“ June 11, 2012), known as Ann Rutherford, was a Canadian-American actress in television, radio and movies. She playied Polly Benedict during the 1930s and 1940s in the Andy Hardy series. She played Scarlett O'Hara's sister in the movie Gone With the Wind (1939). ==References== Category:1917 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Actors from Vancouver Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors
